channel.title: apt-get upgrade breaks the gateway
channel.description:
When I update the gateway with apt-get upgrade (whonix stable repository) it won't boot anymore in my VirtualBox. It just prints multiple lines of "Begin: Running /scripts/local-block ... done.".
EDIT: As of writing this, it now works...

item.title: apt-get upgrade breaks the gateway
item.dc:creator: koolfish
item.description:
When I update the gateway with apt-get upgrade (whonix stable repository) it won’t boot anymore in my VirtualBox. It just prints multiple lines of “Begin: Running /scripts/local-block … done.”.

EDIT: As of writing this, it now works…
